question: How did Tea Cake wind up being cut by a man with a switch blade?
answer: Tea Cake was cut while gambling on payday in Jacksonville. He won all the money in the dice game, including cleaning out a man called Double-Ugly. When Tea Cake tried to leave around 4 o'clock in the morning with his winnings, Double-Ugly accused him of switching the dice. As Tea Cake reached the door with his hat on and one arm in his coat, Double-Ugly jumped at him from behind and cut him twice in the back with a razor (not a switch blade). Tea Cake then grabbed Double-Ugly by his necktie and overpowered him, causing Double-Ugly to lose his razor while trying to get free. Tea Cake left Double-Ugly on the doorstep and made his way home to Janie. Notably, it was actually Double-Ugly who used a razor, while Tea Cake had bought a new switch-blade knife for protection before the game.
quote: Right dere he jumped at me as Ah turned to see de doorstep outside and cut me twice in de back... All but Double-Ugly. He claimed Ah switched de dice. Ah shoved de money down deep in mah pocket and picked up mah hat and coat wid mah left hand and kept mah right hand on mah knife. Ah didn't keer what he said long as he didn't try tuh do nothin'. Ah got mah hat on and one arm in mah coat as Ah got to de door.
